content: To set a storage quota for user, add an attribute in the LDAP directory (for example, UsersQuotaLimit) and enter an integer value for this attribute. It will display the quota value in bytes. Here, specify the attribute name only. This attribute will be applied only during the first setup and can be later changed manually in the {{contactsName}} section.

comment.text: This translation key is used to provide a tooltip explaining how to set a storage quota for a user in an LDAP directory. It appears as part of a form element where users can input an attribute value, and it helps clarify the purpose of this action.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "على سبيل المثال" (for example) is placed after the LDAP directory description. It might read better before to align with English phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: لتعيين حصة تخزين للمستخدم، أضف خاصية في دليل LDAP (على سبيل المثال، UsersQuotaLimit) وأدخل قيمة عددية لهذه الخاصية.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "قيمة عددية" (numerical value) is a bit literal and could be simplified for a more natural flow. While technically correct, 'numerical value' is less common in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: لتعيين حصة تخزين للمستخدم، أضف خاصية في دليل LDAP (على سبيل المثال، UsersQuotaLimit) وأدخل قيمةً لهذه الخاصية.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "This function will be executed only during initial setup" is a literal translation of a less natural phrasing in Azerbaijani. A better translation would convey the meaning of application limitation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bu funksiya yalnız ilk qurulma zamanı tətbiq ediləcək

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Bu funksiya yalnız ilkin quraşdırma zamanı həyata keçiriləcək" sounds slightly awkward.  The verb 'həyata keçiriləcək' (will be executed) is not the most natural fit here.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bu funksiya yalnız ilk qurulma zamanı tətbiq ediləcək.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "μη αυτόματα" (literally, "non-automatically") in "μπορεί να αλλάξει αργότερα μη αυτόματα στην ενότητα «{{contactsName}}»" is awkward and doesn't accurately convey the intended meaning. It should be replaced with a term that means 'manually'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: μπορεί να αλλάξει αργότερα με μη αυτόματο τρόπο στην ενότητα «{{contactsName}}»

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of a backslash to escape the Greek quotes around '{{contactsName}}' is unnecessary and may cause display issues. They should be standard Greek quotation marks.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: μπορεί να αλλάξει αργότερα με μη αυτόματο τρόπο στην ενότητα «{{contactsName}}»

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English text states the quota is displayed in bytes, while the Finnish translation says 'bitteinä' (bits). This is a significant discrepancy.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change 'bitteinä' to 'tavuina' to accurately reflect the English text which states 'bytes'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ensimmäisten asetusten aikana' could be misinterpreted. 'Ensimmäinen asennus' would be more common and accurate for 'first setup'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change 'ensimmäisten asetusten aikana' to 'ensimmäisessä asennuksessa' or 'ensimmäisellä kerralla'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian word for "attribute" is inconsistently translated. It appears as "հատկանիշ" throughout the translation. While technically correct, it might benefit from a more standardized term, potentially clarified based on the specific context of LDAP attributes.  Consider if a more specific term would improve clarity for Armenian users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider researching and potentially using a more specific or commonly understood Armenian term for 'attribute' in the context of LDAP.  While 'հատկանիշ' is correct, it may not be the most accessible term.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The variable `{{contactsName}}` appears in the translated text without proper handling of the curly braces, which might cause rendering issues depending on the translation platform used. While the English version is consistent, it's important to verify that Armenian systems correctly handle these variables.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Confirm that the translation platform correctly renders the variable `{{contactsName}}` and that there are no unexpected rendering issues or formatting errors.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Verrà visualizzato il valore della quota in byte' is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing might be 'Il valore della quota verrà visualizzato in byte.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Il valore della quota verrà visualizzato in byte.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'potrà essere modificato manualmente in seguito nella sezione {{contactsName}}' sounds slightly unnatural. A more fluid translation would be 'potrà essere modificato manualmente nella sezione {{contactsName}}'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: potrà essere modificato manualmente nella sezione {{contactsName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'LDAP ディレクトリに属性（例：UsersQuotaLimit）を追加し' could be improved for better readability. The parenthesis placement feels slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: LDAP ディレクトリに属性を追加し（例：UsersQuotaLimit）

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'セットアップ' (setuppu) in '最初のセットアップ時にのみ適用され' might be too technical for a general user. A more accessible term could be considered.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 最初の設定時にのみ適用され

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "할당량이 바이트 단위로 표시됩니다" (The quota will be displayed in bytes) doesn't directly translate the intention of 'It will display the quota value in bytes.' It's a bit too literal and could be more naturally expressed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 할당량 값은 바이트 단위로 표시됩니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be improved for better readability. Splitting the instruction into two separate sentences might enhance clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 사용자에 대한 스토리지 할당량을 설정하려면 LDAP 디렉토리에 속성을 추가하고(예: UsersQuotaLimit) 이 속성에 대한 정수 값을 입력하세요. 할당량 값은 바이트 단위로 표시됩니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "ໄບต์" (byte) appears twice. While technically correct, it might be more user-friendly to use a more common Lao term for bytes, or briefly explain it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider adding a brief explanation or using a more commonly understood term for bytes, if applicable to the target audience.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ມັນຈະສະແດງຄ່າຈຳນວນທີ່ກ່ຽວຂ້ອງໃນໄບต์" could be more naturally phrased. It's a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ມັນຈະສະແດງຈຳນວນທີ່ກ່ຽວຂ້ອງເປັນໄບต์ (It will display the related amount in bytes)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes the phrase "Lai iestatītu lietotāja krātuves kvotu". This phrasing, while grammatically correct, could be slightly more concise and user-friendly. Consider a more direct phrasing like 'Lai norādītu lietotāja krātuves kvotu'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lai norādītu lietotāja krātuves kvotu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English text says "It will display the quota value in bytes." The Latvian translation uses 'baitos' (in bytes). While technically correct, it might be more helpful to clarify that the value represents a size in bytes, which is important for users to understand.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tas parādīs kvotas vērtību, kas atbilst izmēram baitos.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Tutaj określ wyłącznie nazwę atrybutu' is a bit abrupt and could be phrased more smoothly. It translates literally to 'Here specify only the attribute name.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aby określić limit pamięci, podaj wyłącznie nazwę atrybutu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Dany atrybut zostanie zastosowany' could be more precise. 'Zostanie zastosowany' implies a general application rather than a one-time application during setup.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Atrybut ten zostanie zastosowany

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'utilizador' should consistently be 'usuário'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: usuário

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'introduza' should consistently be 'insira'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: insira

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'O valor da quota será apresentado em bytes' could be improved for clarity. While technically correct, it sounds slightly unnatural in Portuguese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A quota será expressa em bytes.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Aqui, especifique apenas o nome do atributo' is grammatically correct, but sounds a bit abrupt. Consider rephrasing for smoother flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Indique aqui apenas o nome do atributo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'To set a storage quota for user' is translated as 'Pentru stabilirea cotei de stocare pentru acest utilizator'.  'Acest utilizator' implies *this* user. The English is more general, referring to setting the quota for *a* user. A better translation might be 'Pentru a stabili cota de stocare pentru un utilizator'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pentru a stabili cota de stocare pentru un utilizator

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'It will display the quota value in bytes' is translated as 'Cota va fi afișată în octeți'. 'octeți' is correct for 'bytes', but the sentence structure could be improved to flow better with the previous sentence. A more natural translation could be 'Cota va fi afișată ca valoare în octeți.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cota va fi afișată ca valoare în octeți.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes "{{contactsName}}", which is a variable that needs to be replaced with the actual contact name in the target language. It's not a literal part of the tooltip itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure that the variable '{{contactsName}}' is replaced with the localized version of the contact name in the final deployment.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "පරිශීලකයෙකු සඳහා" translates to "for a user" but the English uses "To set a storage quota for user". It's more natural to say "පරිශීලකයින් සඳහා ගබඩා කෝටාව සකස් කිරීමට" to align closer to the English meaning. "පරිශීලකයෙකු සඳහා" is grammatically correct but less idiomatic in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිශීලකයින් සඳහා ගබඩා කෝටාව සකස් කිරීමට

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'attribute' as 'ගුණාංගයක්' is accurate, but the sentence structure feels slightly awkward. Consider rephrasing for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: LDAP නාමාවලියේ ගුණාංගයක් එක් කරන්න (උදාහරණයක් ලෙස, UsersQuotaLimit) සහ එම ගුණාංගය සඳහා...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase “මෙය බයිට් වලින් කෝටා අගය පෙන්වනු ඇත.” while technically accurate, feels a little too literal and formal. A more natural phrasing would convey that the value will be *interpreted* as bytes.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: එය බයිට් වශයෙන් සැලකෙන කෝටා අගය පෙන්වනු ඇත.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase “මෙහි, ගුණාංගයේ නම පමණක් සඳහන් කරන්න.” can be improved to be more direct.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙන්න, ගුණාංගයේ නම පමණක් සඳහන් කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'අදාළ' is used in the phrase 'මෙම ගුණාංගය පළමු සැකසුම අතරතුර පමණක් අදාළ කරනු ඇත'. It's a bit formal and could be better conveyed with a simpler term.  'එලා' or 'ඉවර' might be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම ගුණාංගය පළමු සැකසුම අතරතුර පමණක් ඉවර කරයි.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'на пример' is overly literal and somewhat awkward in this context. While technically correct, it could be improved for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'на пример' with a more natural phrasing like 'као што је' or simply omitting it and stating 'UsersQuotaLimit'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The variable {{contactsName}} is present. Ensure this variable is correctly handled and resolves to the appropriate contact section name in the user interface.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Verify that {{contactsName}} resolves to the correct display name for the contacts section.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'direktorijum' is a valid word but less common than 'ldap direktorijum'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ldap direktorijum

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'Kvota će se prikazivati u bajtovima' could be improved for flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kvota će biti prikazana u bajtovima.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Kota değerini bayt cinsinden gösterecektir" is a literal translation and sounds awkward in Turkish. It's better to convey that the quota is represented in bytes without explicitly stating 'in bytes'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kota değeri bayt cinsinden olacaktır.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Bayt cinsinden gösterecektir" should be more concisely written, as 'cinsinden' can be omitted.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kota değeri bayt cinsinden olacak.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "лиши ім'я атрибута" is awkward and doesn't accurately convey "Here, specify the attribute name only." A more natural Ukrainian phrasing would be "Тут вкажіть лише назву атрибута" or "Вкажіть тут лише назву атрибута".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Тут вкажіть лише назву атрибута

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Vietnamese translation includes unnecessary phrasing "Ở đây, chỉ cần chỉ ra tên thuộc tính." which doesn't directly correspond to the English's brevity and intention.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove "Ở đây, chỉ cần chỉ ra tên thuộc tính." to match the English's concise style.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "此属性仅在首次设置时应用" could be misinterpreted. It implies the quota setting is permanent after the first setup, which isn't accurate based on the English context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 此属性仅在首次设置时生效，之后可以在{{contactsName}}部分手动更改。
